subtitle: MacDropAny vous permet de synchroniser n'importe quel dossier de votre ordinateur avec le cloud
prerequisites-content: To use MacDropAny, you must already have a cloud storage service (like Dropbox or iCloud Drive) running on your computer.
how-macdropany-works-content: MacDropAny will move the folder you want to sync into this cloud storage service, and then MacDropAny will create a shortcut from the folder's original location to its new location in the cloud.
sync-your-folder-title: Sync Your Folder with the Cloud
Choose a folder to sync with the cloud: Choose a folder to sync with the cloud
step-subtitle-start: Drop a folder here or click to choose a folder
step-subtitle-folder-selected: Click to choose a different folder
donate-menu-item: Donate to the Developer of MacDropAny
